name: Outlaw (itch) (Oww321)
description:
Outlaw is  2D sidescroller where to control a cowboy taking down bandits in an endless series of small levels. Try and get as far as you can.

Controls

  • Move = A/D
  • Jump = Space
  • Crouch/Buy = Left Shift
  • Aim = W/S
  • Shoot = Up Arrow
  • Reload = E
  • Roll = Right Arrow
  • Use Item = Down Arrow
  • Quit Game = Escape

I made this game really fast as break from my more serious attempts at making a good game. I made it in about two weeks after I got tired of working on Bastion.
